Module com.andrei.pt_30424_pelle_andrei_assignment_4
Package com.andrei.DataAccess

Class ReportBillWriter

java.lang.Object
com.andrei.DataAccess.ReportBillWriter
public class ReportBillWriter extends Object
This class contains methods for writing reports to a file and generating bills for orders.

      public ReportBillWriter()

  • Method Details

    • generateBill

      public void generateBill(Order order)
      This method generates a bill for a given order. The file name is dynamically generated using the date in the specified format on the first line and the client name. Details included in the report are the date, client details, ordered products and the total value of the order.
      Parameters:
      order - -> order with info to be permeated to a file. A call to order details is necessary in order to get the menu items associated with the order.

    • deleteBill

      public void deleteBill(Order order)
      Deletes the file associated with an order that no longer exists. If the file cannot be found or the deletion otherwise did not happen, an alert will be printed to system error.
      Parameters:
      order - -> order object to have its corresponding bill deleted.

    • writeReport1

      public void writeReport1(List<EmployeeController.FullOrder> updatedList, int minSecondFilter, int maxSecondFilter, int minMinuteFilter, int maxMinuteFilter, int minHourFilter, int maxHourFilter)
      Writes the details of report 1 to a file "contains all the orders completed between different times of the day" Prints to system error will be made if writing cannot happen.
      Parameters:
      updatedList - -> list to write
      minSecondFilter - -> filter, -1 if not applied
      maxSecondFilter - -> filter, -1 if not applied
      minMinuteFilter - -> filter, -1 if not applied
      maxMinuteFilter - -> filter, -1 if not applied
      minHourFilter - -> filter, -1 if not applied
      maxHourFilter - -> filter, -1 if not applied

    • writeReport2

      public void writeReport2(List<MenuItem> updatedList, int filter)
      Generates report 2 for administrator: "contains all the products ordered a minimum number of times so far"
      Parameters:
      updatedList - -> updated list of menu items to write to file
      filter - -> filter for orders, if -1 will be considered 0.

    • writeReport3

      public void writeReport3(List<Report3Controller.ReportClient> reportClients, int minOrderFilter, double minPriceFilter)
      Generates report 3 for administrator: "all the clients that have ordered a minimum number of times so far" and the order value higher than a specific amount
      Parameters:
      reportClients - -> clients to write to file
      minOrderFilter - -> minimum number of orders for each client
      minPriceFilter - -> minimum price for each order

    • writeReport4

      public void writeReport4(List<Report4Controller.ReportProduct> reportProducts, LocalDate localDate)
      Generates report 4 for administrator: all the products ordered within a specific day and the number of times they have been ordered.
      Parameters:
      reportProducts - -> products that have been filtered
      localDate - -> filter date for report
